Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Elevator

  • public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
    Elevator class which contains bulk of elevator-related activities. This elevator executes much of not just the functioning of the elevator but also the movements of the passengers. Comes with an elevator stack (real elevator), temp elevator, stairJail (passengers who took the stairs) and elevatorHeaven (passengers who completed their ride on the elevator). In the lore of this project, this data is observed by the GoPro in the corner of the elevator.
    Author:
    arta

      • removePassenger

        public void removePassenger(int currentFloor)
        Returns empty if elevator is empty; otherwise, each passenger is pushed onto the temp elevator stack and the top of the tenp stack is evaluated as to whether that passenger is getting off at that floor. If so, they ascend to elevator heaven. If not, another passenger is pushed onto temp and the process repeats until the main elevator is empty and everyone has been evaluated.
        Parameters:
        currentFloor - Floor passed from main which the elevator is on

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull(Passenger passenger)
        Evaluates whether the elevator is full and if the passenger waiting to get on must take the stairs.
        Parameters:
        passenger - The passenger waiting to get on the elevator
        Returns:
        Boolean true/false as to whether the elevator is full

      • setIsFullTimes

        public void setIsFullTimes()
        A counter designed to prevent the next passenger in isFull from taking the stairs and displaying the isFull message multiple times in the same main while-loop iteration.

      • elevatorEmpty

        public boolean elevatorEmpty()
        Detects if the elevator is empty. If so, the empty counter is incremented and the method returns true. If not, the method returns false.
        Returns:
        Boolean value true/false as to whether the elevator was empty.

      • tempElevatorEmpty

        public boolean tempElevatorEmpty()
        Returns whether the temp elevator is empty.
        Returns:
        Boolean true/false value as to whether the temp elevator is empty

      • whichFloor

        public int whichFloor(Passenger newPass)
        Determines which floor to next travel to, given a passenger who is trying to get on
        Parameters:
        newPass - the passenger who wants get onto the elevator
        Returns:
        int value for the closestFloor to which the elevator will travel

      • getCurrentFloor

        public int getCurrentFloor()
        Gets current floor of the elevator object.
        Returns:
        Current floor of elevator

      • setCurrentFloor

        public void setCurrentFloor(int currentFloor)
        Sets the current floor given an int argument
        Parameters:
        currentFloor - Integer value between 1-5 which will then become the current floor of this elevator object

      • printStats

        public void printStats(java.lang.String fileName)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Prints total statistics for the entire activity as observed by the "GoPro" mounted in the elevator. Takes the fileName to generate an output file elevatorHeaven is where people go when they leave the elevator. stairJail is where people go when they have to take the stairs.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file that will be used to print the output
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception that probably indicates an inability to write to file
